p: Of the total number of patients ( n = 105), 53.3% ( n = 56) were males and 46.7% ( n = 49) were females, giving a sex ratio of almost 1:1. The incidence of HM in all patients was 60% ( n = 63); with a slightly higher incidence in males than in females (55.6%, n = 35 for men vs. 44.4%, n = 28 for women). In the normal myelogram group, the figures were 50% n = 21 for men vs. 50% n = 21 for women), without any significant impact of sex ( P = 0.576) on HM incidence.
